title: I dreamed that I gave birth to a boy while I was pregnant, so what does this dream mean?

preview.html: I dreamed that I gave birth to a boy while I was pregnant. The dream of giving birth to a boy can be seen by many in their dreams, and this is of course a natural dream, as the date of birth approaches, and today we will present to you interpretations of this dream, which came a little varied.. I dreamed that I gave birth to a boy while I was pregnant, so what is the interpretation of the dream? He said Leading commentators say that a woman’s dream of giving birth to a boy may indicate that the woman will give birth and that the woman will have good qualities that will make her able to protect herself and be a source of pride for her parents. Whenever the date of birth approaches and a pregnant woman sees this dream, this is evidence that she has gotten rid of the natural pregnancy pain that preceded birth and that she She gives birth to her baby well and does not find it difficult. birth. Or pain. Ibn Sirin said that a pregnant woman who suffers from severe pain makes her think about the possibility of losing her fetus, and she sees in her dream that she is giving birth to a boy, and this is evidence of her recovery from the pain that she suffered from, and her stability. Her current health condition. If she is poor or going through financial crises due to her need to get pregnant and give birth, then there is money coming her way, and her husband may get a promotion and a bonus at his job with the arrival of the new baby, and he may inherit. A lot of money that he does not put into her accounts. I dreamed that I gave birth to a son while I was married, so what is the interpretation? Childbirth basically means comfort, peace, and a lot of goodness that the dreamer obtains. If a married woman who is not pregnant, or who has never given birth and has never given birth, sees that she has given birth to a child, then there are some positive changes happening in her life. Next time. If there is a quarrel or disagreement between the spouses, it is time to get rid of it and return life to normal, calm and stability. However, if life between the spouses is already stable, then there is an imminent pregnancy, happiness, and the strengthening of relationships between families. A married woman left her home angry because of a major problem. The reason may be her suspicion of the behavior of her husband, who believes that he is having an affair with another woman. Her visions here show that this belief is wrong, and that her husband is loyal to her and has not thought about communicating with another woman in any way. But if the cause of the problem is the woman’s inability to have children, then It made her lack confidence, always believe that her husband has the right to marry another woman, and at the same time she cannot bear this idea and does not do it. She can stand up for herself, then the dream foretells her either that a child is coming or that the husband loves her so much and is so indescribably attached to her that he would rather live with her without children than leave her and marry another woman to bear her. He has children. I dreamed that I gave birth to a boy and I am single. Although a girl who sees such a dream may be very worried, it is one of the good dreams that bodes well for her. Of the best work. As for a girl who has finished her studies and wants to find a suitable job to help her parents and bear some responsibilities on her father’s shoulders if he is a poor man, then her giving birth to a boy in her dream is evidence that she is. She is able to satisfy her desire, and already works in a high-ranking institution, and achieves the same

title: Interpretation of seeing Tawaf in a dream for a single woman, a married woman, and a pregnant woman has different interpretations

preview.html: Interpretation of Tawaf in a dream for a single, married, or pregnant woman has different interpretations. He is making Hajj and the next few days will be very good. In this article, we will learn together about the interpretation of circumambulation in a dream for unmarried and pregnant women with different interpretations. Interpretation of a dream about seeing circumambulation in a dream. Seeing walking around the Kaaba in a dream means that what the dreamer desires will come true. If the dreamer feels longing during the tour, then this vision expresses his resurrection Charitable works in reality. One of the connotations of seeing circumambulation around the Kaaba is that it is evidence of the nearness of comfort and the end of worry, and an indication of abundant livelihood and blessings. This vision also symbolizes the dreamer’s protection from magic and envy, and it is the happy news of the sick dreamer’s recovery from his illness. Seeing the completion of Seven circles around the Kaaba to visit the Sacred House of God to perform the Hajj. If the dreamer sees himself walking around the Kaaba alone, then this vision indicates that the dreamer is going through a crisis that he would like to end. But if the dreamer sees that the Kaaba is in his house and sees many people circling it, then this The vision shows the dreamer’s good deeds, which highlights his high status among those around him in reality. Seeing circumambulating in a dream and kissing the Black Stone is a sign of righteousness and piety. As for seeing the Kaaba and looking at it repeatedly in a dream, it is a sign of changing circumstances for the better. In the event that the Kaaba is not seen During Hajj, this vision is long for the dreamer and indicates that he is committing forbidden things in reality. Interpretation of a dream about seeing circumambulation around the Kaaba in a dream for a single woman. This vision for an unmarried girl symbolizes her close marriage, and this vision also expresses achieving goals in reality. If you see yourself circumambulating around the Kaaba in Home, then this dream indicates the good morals that she enjoys. If an unmarried woman dreams that she is holding the cover of the Kaaba in her hands, then this dream symbolizes purity and concealment. Interpretation of a dream about seeing Tawaf in a dream for a married woman: If a married woman sees herself circling the Kaaba with tears, then This vision promises that her skin will achieve what she wants on earth. Seeing the circumambulation of the Holy Kaaba with the completion of the seven circles is good news for the pregnant woman in her pregnancy, and God knows best. If you see the Kaaba in the house, then circumambulating it in a dream means goodness and abundance for her and all of its members, and God knows best. Interpretation of a dream Seeing Tawaf in a dream for a pregnant woman. As for the meaning of this vision for a pregnant woman, it is good for her to give birth to a child, and if she sees that she is praying Tawaf, then this vision indicates the birth of a male child, and God knows best. Better. This vision also shows the approaching date of birth. Sailing around the Holy Kaaba in a dream is one of the dreams that gives the dreamer beautiful and comfortable days, and that the problems he faced in the previous period will end and that there are many beautiful moments awaiting their arrival. They are close, God willing.

title: Instant dream interpretation application - the best dream interpretation program

preview.html: Instant dream interpretation application - the best dream interpretation program. Through our research into these applications, we found for you the best dream interpretation application, which is the direct dreams application, and what distinguishes this application is the presence of experts specialized in dream interpretation. The immediate answer from expert dream interpretation experts. The instant dream interpretation application - the best dream interpretation program. The instant dream interpretation application works to provide the appropriate answer to interpret what you saw in your dream or dream, so that the experts in dream interpretation follow the method of interpreting Ibn Sirin or Al-Nabulsi and other scholars in this matter. . sector.The application is very easy, simplified and has many unique features. The application provides you with the correct interpretation of all your dreams instantly. The application allows you to include your personal information from marital status, gender, sexuality and age with the dream giving you an accurate interpretation based on many reliable interpretations. What distinguishes Applying direct interpretation of dreams for others: Interpreting your dream in the biography of the greatest scholars, including Ibn Sirin, Al-Nabulsi, and other ancient geniuses who excelled in reaching the secrets of this mysterious world. You can watch your past dreams in complete privacy. You can also delete the dream after checking its interpretation. The application is a religious reference, learn about the meaning and significance of your dream and understand it more through the interpretation of dreams from the Holy Quran and the hadiths of the Messenger, may God bless him and grant him peace. May God bless him and grant him peace. The ability to see an infinite number of common and strange dreams that are updated daily, and you can also save the dreams you like in your favorites to make it easier to refer to them directly and read them again. title: Interpretation of a nightgown in a dream for a single girl, married to a pregnant woman

preview.html: Considering the nightgown, whether you are buying new, old, dirty, clean, short, long, narrow or wide, its color is white, black, red, blue according to Ibn Sirin and more. The verbal interpretation of seeing a nightgown in a dream: The phrase “nightwear” consists of two words, “shirt and sleep.” In the world of dreams, the shirt symbolizes optimism and good news, and sleep indicates comfort, calm, tranquility and reassurance. Seeing a nightgown in an unmarried girl’s dream: As for an unmarried girl and seeing her as if she is buying a nightgown, wearing it, or bringing her a gift, this dream is praiseworthy and bodes well, Its interpretation varies according to its color and shape. The red or pink nightgown symbolizes the emotional state in which this girl lives, the white nightgown symbolizes purity, friendliness, and purity, and the silk nightgown heralds marriage. Sleeping in a transparent or open nightgown, it is also undesirable to see loss, loss, theft, tearing or burning in the nightgown. The best vision is to see an unmarried girl walking in a nightgown, as this portends her marriage or engagement soon, and the nightgown appears If a married woman sees in her dream that she is buying a group of different and colorful nightgowns, this calls for joy and optimism, as it indicates that this woman is heading towards important and happy situations and moments in her future life. . Especially if these shirts are in bright colors such as blue or green. For a married woman to see in her dream that she is wearing a red nightgown, this calls for optimism and a lot of goodness, as it means that her life on the emotional and marital level will witness renewal and very great change, and that her life will be complete positive changes. Optimism, ambition, and success, God willing. On the contrary, seeing a light white or transparent nightgown is disturbing and distasteful, because it symbolizes loss, confusion, and delusions that control the person, in the case of seeing a married woman wearing a white nightgown in the street, for example. , or receiving people while wearing it. The plain white nightgown deserves praise because it symbolizes peace and spiritual and emotional purity, and it is abhorrent to see a married woman wearing a nightgown during prayer or Hajj. The insight passes. The black nightgown is a good vision in a married woman’s dream, because it reflects the strong relationship and interdependence between the spouses, and the best vision is for the husband to see his wife buying a black nightgown and giving it to her. It will bring goodness and happiness. Seeing a nightgown in a pregnant woman’s dream. As for the meaning of seeing a nightgown in a pregnant woman’s dream, seeing a white nightgown foretells an easy and healthy birth, and a red nightgown means near birth, and a black, blue, or brown nightgown can predict a male child, and the best vision is To see a long, opaque silk nightgown. Seeing buying a nightgown in a pregnant woman’s dream indicates recovery and security, as well as seeing a tank

title: Interpretation of ascending to the sky in a dream. Interpretation of ascending to the sky in a dream

preview.html: The meaning of seeing the sky, ascending to the top, looking at the sky and praying, descending from the sky, going into space to a high place, Ibn Sirin’s spaceship. Interpretation of ascending to heaven in a dream. To see yourself ascending to heaven in a dream by means of a ladder or a rope, this indicates transcendence and luck. Happy: To see yourself climbing to the sky in a dream without a rope or a ladder means extreme fear of the authorities. Seeing them taken to the sky to spy and eavesdrop. Whoever ascends to the sky in a dream to look at the earth, it honors him and regrets what he missed. As for the sick person who is awake, if he ascends to the sky and no longer announces his death If he returns to earth, evil will end, and he will be saved, God willing. Seeing ascension to the lower heaven indicates attaining a great position. Seeing ascension to the second heaven indicates gaining knowledge and literature. Seeing ascension to the third heaven indicates gaining wealth, joy, and pleasure. Seeing ascension to the fourth heaven indicates prestige and power. It appears The vision of ascending to the fifth heaven is strength. The vision of ascending to the sixth heaven indicates jurisprudence, asceticism, and administration. The vision of ascending to the seventh heaven indicates the acquisition of real estate and lands. And whoever sees himself above the seventh heaven will attain dignity and glory and perish. Whoever dreams that he is rotating in the sky and then descends from it, this indicates that he is learning the stars. And the hidden sciences, referred to as. Interpretation of the vision of ascension to heaven. Visions of ascension vary and their interpretations differ. There are some interpretations that indicate that the sky in a dream symbolizes the ruler or the person in authority. It may refer to the place where the ruler lives, or it may refer to the ruler’s power, money, environment, or honor. Ascending to the sky in a dream using a ladder, ladder, or any tall building. Or any means of elevation, it may be a sign of the dreamer’s rise in his work or his arrival to power if it is appropriate for that. Ascension to Heaven: In a dream, it indicates the acquisition of leadership and great honor. As for ascending to Heaven by a ladder or by any other means, this is evidence of fear, extreme domestication, and threat. From the Lord and falling into many problems or humiliation in his affairs. Whoever sees that he is ascending to heaven to eavesdrop on others, this indicates that he is spying on the Sultan. Or he saw that he was breaking into the ruler’s palace to steal his money and arrived, so he would reach his goal, whether it was spying, asking for more from the eye, or requesting a specific thing, and if he returned to earth without any harm being done to him. This indicates salvation from what could harm him. The dream of ascending to Paradise and entering Paradise with joy indicates connotation of goodness and goodness, such as martyrdom in the path of God Almighty, or death in the religion of Islam, or victory in Paradise, or gaining honor and a good memory. Whoever sees that he is in the sky and then suddenly falls from it to the ground: this is a sign of abandoning Islam and disbelief. If the sky opens and a young man comes out of it, it is a sign of a stranger who appears to the dreamer or to the people of his country and he is his or their enemy and causes them division and enmity. In the animal, because each animal has a certain interpretation, for example, the camel or camel refers to the riddle rain

title: Interpretation of seeing blood in a dream by Ibn Sirin “The most accurate interpretations”

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing blood in a dream for a married woman. In this article, learn about the interpretation of seeing blood in a dream for a married woman. A married woman suffers from a state of panic when she sees blood in her dream, whether that blood is from her or from someone else. No, and interpretation scholars such as Muhammad Ibn Sirin tried to provide an interpretation of a married woman’s dream of blood, and we will explain this through the following lines in the encyclopedia. The symbol of blood in a dream for a married woman. A married woman’s dream of blood symbolizes the presence of disagreements between the dreamer and her husband or one of her relatives or a feeling of sadness in her life. If a married woman dreams that she is bleeding, this blood will suddenly stop. This means that the dreamer is in pain, but it will not last. Whoever sees in her dream that she is able to stop the bleeding. Her vision showed her ability to solve problems before they get worse. When a married woman sees in her dream that she failed to stop the bleeding. This is an indication that she should seek the help of a wise relative to correct this problem. There are those who interpreted a married woman who sees blood in her dream as a sign of an improvement in her relationship with her husband and the occurrence of events that will make her happy. Seeing a married woman looking for a cup of blood symbolizes that she will benefit from someone in An important position. A dream of light blood coming from a married woman’s nose indicates the dreamer’s success in solving a problem he faced. But if this blood is abundant. The vision shows that the owner is hiding her sorrows inside herself, because she does not find anyone to reveal them to. If the vision is pregnant. This dream expresses for her the ease of childbirth if the blood coming out of her nose is light. If it is heavy, this means that she may face problems during pregnancy or childbirth. Seeing blood falling on the floor of the house symbolizes difficulty in the life of the dreamer and her husband as a result of the magical actions that he performed. It has a person who is envious of them. A married woman vomiting blood in a dream expresses her salvation from the evil that negatively affects her life. For a married woman to see that her breasts are bleeding, this means that she cares about her children and her husband, or this may indicate the weakness of her character and her inability to make any decision. But if this bleeding is the result of a wound in the dreamer’s chest. This means that her husband is ignoring her, which causes her great sadness. One of the bad dreams is for a married woman to see that she is urinating blood. It means committing sins and transgressions or obtaining their money from illegal sources. Interpretation of blood in a dream for a woman married to Ibn Sirin Muhammad Ibn Sirin says that blood in a married woman’s dream symbolizes the continuation of problems in her life with her husband due to hatred and envy. Who sees in her dream that she is constantly bleeding? Her vision showed that she was frustrated because of her failure to correct the behavior of her husband or children. A married woman’s dream that she stopped shedding blood indicates that she is seeking to take care of her husband after a dispute with him to take care of her children and her home. Seeing blood in a dream for a married woman from the mouthIf a married woman sees in a dream that her mouth is bleeding profusely. This is evidence that she is unfair to her husband in a way that offends her morals. If the blood is light, this means that one of her children will suffer.

title: Interpretation of a dream about a black snake for a married woman

preview.html: However, the interpretation differs in the case of killing a black snake in a dream. What is the interpretation of the vision in the case of each person, which we will learn about in this article and learn the opinion of some interpreters from our translator’s website. Follow us. Interpretation of seeing a black snake in a dream for a single girl. Seeing an unmarried girl in a dream that a snake A black snake chasing her and running away from her is a good vision. It indicates that God will keep her away from the dangers that she will be exposed to. A single girl sees in her dream that a large black snake is trying to kill her, and it actually kills her. The vision shows that she will get rid of an old enemy who hates her. Or she will stay away from marriage that causes It has its sadness. Either killing a black snake in a dream for a single girl is a victory over an enemy. It indicates freedom from anxiety and religion. You may be interested: Interpretation of a dream about a snake bite in a dream and its meaningInterpretation of seeing a black snake in a dream for a married womanWhen a married woman sees a big black snake in her dream In her house and she is afraid of him. The vision means that her husband will suffer from a serious health crisis. This crisis makes him unable to move and the wife regrets her inability to manage her family’s affairs. Scientists have also interpreted a married woman’s vision of a snake in her house. She announces her husband’s infidelity and that is why she is considering divorcing him, and God knows best. If a married woman sees a black snake in her bed, the vision means that her husband will leave her because of problems between them. The black snake in a married woman’s dream, when it changes color, means that a woman or friend will approach her husband to communicate with him. Therefore, the vision is a message to protect her husband. If A married woman saw a small black snake in her dream. The dream means that she will give birth to a child, which will lead to a health crisis for her. Killing a married woman with a black snake is evidence of her fear for her family. Seeing a married woman with a black snake under a tree means that the enemy is planning harm or trap. For her, and God knows best. A snake moving on water in a married woman’s dream means heavy rains that will destroy her home. A married woman sees a black snake disappearing and she cannot catch it. This means that she is exposed to a disease that will make her bedridden. A white snake in a married woman’s dream indicates that the enemy He plans to steal her money. Interpretation of seeing a black snake in a dream in a dream about a man and its meaning. A black snake in a man’s dream means a dangerous enemy that he will be exposed to. For a man to see a big black snake in his dream and then kill it means his victory over an enemy. The vision also means that this person will get rid of the crises in his life. If a big black snake bites a man in his dream, the vision means that he will fall into a great crisis and misguidance. But he will get rid of it, God willing. Read also: Interpretation of a dream about a brown snake. The meaning of seeing a black snake in a pregnant woman’s dream and its interpretation. Seeing a pregnant woman with a big black snake biting her hand. The vision indicates that she will be exposed to a financial crisis, and that God will relieve her and provide her with help, God willing. Either the pregnant woman will see a large black snake entering her house and then kill it. The vision indicated that she will be exposed to a big problem but will get rid of it. Or that she has an enemy that she was able to eliminate.

title: Interpretation of a dream about photo albums in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about a photo album in a dream. In the following lines, we will learn about the interpretation of dreaming about a photo album in a dream and whether it is good or bad according to the interpretations of scholars and interpreters. Interpretation of a dream about photo albums in a dream. Interpretation of a dream about a photo album in a dream. Browsing through a photo album can indicate a meeting with Beloved, God is Most High and Most Knowing. When a girl sees an empty photo album, this could be a sign that she needs some relationships, and God knows the unseen. If a divorced woman is seen buying a new empty photo album, this could be a sign of a new beginning, God willing. When a pregnant woman sees herself buying an album An empty picture, this could lead to her celebrating her new baby and God knows all that is unseen. Interpretation of a dream about a picture frame in a dream Interpretation of a dream about a picture frame in a dream could be a sign of positive changes, God willing. In the event that a married woman sees a picture frame, it can lead to changes Positive, and God knows the unseen. When a married man sees an empty frame for a photo, this may indicate the absence of friends. And God knows the unseen. If the dreamer sees a frame for a wedding or engagement photo, this may indicate good news. And God knows the unseen. Interpretation of a dream about pictures in a dream. Interpretation of a dream about pictures in a dream may indicate hypocrites. And God is Greatest and Most Knowing. If a married woman sees pictures, they can be attributed to evil people, and God knows the unseen. When a single girl sees pictures, this may indicate fake friends, and God knows the unseen. Likewise, if a married man sees pictures, it may indicate hypocrites, and God knows best. Interpretation of a dream about accidentally sending my picture to someone In a dream: Interpretation of dreams about accidentally sending my photo to someone in a dream. Sending pictures can indicate trouble, and God knows the unseen. If a girl is seen sending pictures, this may lead to problems with the closest people, and God is Greatest and Most Knowing. If a married woman is seen sending pictures, this may indicate hatred of people, and God knows the unseen. Interpretation of a dream about photographing the sea in Dream Interpretation of a dream about depicting the sea in a dream could be a sign of temptation, and God knows best. In the event that a young man sees an image of the sea in a dream, this may be evidence of worry and sadness. God is Most High, and you both know that seeing a married woman photographing the sea could indicate temptation that is spreading among people, and God knows best. A single girl saw a picture of the sea, this may lead to worries, and God knows the unseen. Interpretation of a dream about losing pictures in a dream. Interpretation of dreams about losing pictures in a dream. We did not find clear explanations for seeing that. However, seeing the loss of something can indicate the need for stability, and God knows the unseen. When you see a loss Something precious, this could lead to the end of the relationship, and God knows the unseen. If a married woman sees losing gold, this may be evidence of not achieving goals, and God knows best. Interpretation of a dream about seeing pictures of a lover in a dream. Interpretation of a dream about seeing pictures of a lover in a dream, perhaps it will lead to marriage, and God knows the unseen. In case she sees a

title: Cooking raw meat in a dream

preview.html: While others dream of what they are looking for, and based on that, we provide an interpretation of seeing this dream in a dream in the following lines. Interpretation of cooking raw meat in a dream by Ibn Sirin. There are many different interpretations associated with cooking raw meat in a dream, including: Ibn Sirin says that the dream of cooking meat when... Its interpretation comes with multiple interpretations of good, profit, evil, and evil, and God Almighty is good and most famous. Whether it is money, marriage, or engagement. God willing, cooking raw meat indicates the dreamer’s source of livelihood. As an interpretation of a dream about cooking meat, it can suggest. With a series of secrets that the dreamer hides And he prefers to hide it, and does not want to reveal it. Interpretation of Ibn Shaheen in Interpretation of a dream about cooking meat. Cooking raw meat in a dream according to the doctrine of Ibn Sirin has many other meanings and meanings, including for example: Ibn Shaheen says that when the dreamer sees raw meat in a dream. This indicates That he receives something useful from an authority. Ibn Shaheen also explained that if the dreamer can extract meat easily. It is evidence of receiving the good that he brings in the way that money, land, or inheritance represents. Contrary to you, Ibn Sirin claims that buying meat is undesirable This indicates some of the problems that dreamers face, because God Almighty knows best. On the other hand, Ibn Shaheen explains that if a fortuneteller cooks raw meat and it does not cook, this indicates that there is a wrong decision in his life, and he needs to reconsider himself before he makes it. We have chosen for you: Seeing yourself eating meat in a dream Interpretation of cooking raw meat in a dream for a single woman A woman’s dream of cooking raw meat in a dream can have different meanings, among which, for example, are all the following: She sees in her dreams an unmarried girl cooking uncooked meat. This means that he is about to live a new life full of kindness, food, and happiness. The interpretation of a dream about cooking meat in a dream also explains. That God, the All-Knowing and Almighty, will soon bless her by marrying a very important person. In addition, the girl who dreams of cooked meat in a dream. This indicates Finding solutions to all the crises she faces, God willing, and a sign that her situation will change for the better. Al-Nabulsi’s interpretation of cooking meat in a dream. Al-Nabulsi mentions in his interpretation of cooking raw meat in a dream that this indicates some important indications that the dreamer must pay attention to, including: Al-Nabulsi believes that meat Cooked meat has multiple meanings. Either because it indicates goodness and bliss. Or because some relatives and friends hate it. As Al-Nabulsi says when he sees men cooking meat on their own, it is an expression of the dreamer or an attempt to achieve what the dreamer wants. But if the dreamer is giving boiled meat to others in His dreams. It shows that he loves kindness, mercy, and obedience to all who are merciful. On the other hand, according to the interpretation of Nabulsi’s dream, if cooked meat that contains a high percentage of fat appears. It indicates abundant benefit, or goodness that will come to the fortuneteller, and lighter meat indicates goodness. Which will produce

title: Interpretation of fire in a dream by Ibn Sirin - Seeing fire in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about fireInterpretation of a dream about seeing a fire A fire in a dream burns me A vision of extinguishing a fire in a dream Burning fire in a dream Al-Manar in a dream Imam Al-Sadiq A fire in the house in a dream A fire in a dream for a pregnant woman Seeing fire in a dream by Ibn Sirin Ibn Sirin says: Whoever sees in his dream a fire burning above his head and his wife is pregnant, this indicates She will give birth to a boy. Extinguishing a fire in a dream. Whoever sees that he extinguished the fire or extinguished it with water or rain, this indicates the presence of problems or obstacles in his work, and whoever sees in a dream a fire coming out of his fingers, this indicates his injustice. Author.Fire in a dream is good news, warning, war, torment, power, imprisonment, loss, and sins. Whoever sees a fire in which there is a spark, sound, and noise, it is a trial in which a world of people will perish. The greatest horror and torment, and whoever lights a fire on a dark night to lead people on the path will acquire knowledge with which to guide people, and whoever lights it without darkness is an innovation. Satan obeys his disobedience. As for whoever sees that he is heating himself with fire in the winter, he is rich, and whoever sees that he is eating fire, then he is unjustly eating the money of orphans, or eating forbidden things. Whoever hits it with fire and does not burn it, and fulfills its appointment, and whoever sees the fire burns some grains, then its price increases, and the burning fire is a misfortune from the Sultan, he declares Hajj. The fire in the fingers is the injustice of the scribes, and the fire in the palm is the injustice of the craft. And a vision that he ascended from a place in heaven, and then the people of that place fought God Almighty in disobedience. A fire came out of his house, in which he gained influence or trade, and whoever sees the ray of its fire from east to west, it is knowledge that reminds him of the east and the west. And if he sees a fire shining from his head, and in it is light and rays, and his wife is pregnant, and gave birth to a dominant son, and he has a large male. Fire in the desert is war, and if he takes embers from the middle of the fire, he brings money that the sultan has forbidden. And whoever sees an extinguished fire, then insomnia will befall, and if the fire is in a country, then it is the death of its leader or scholar, and if it goes out in his garden, then it is the death of the jinn, and harmful fire indicates... The power of injustice, and if people benefit from it, it indicates good authority, and fire in winter indicates fruit, so they say: Fire is the fruit of winter, and eating fire indicates eating and drinking from forbidden utensils such as gold and silver, and it may indicate to its worshipers as if it were ablution. And darkness. Seeing fire in a dream. Dreaming of fire in a dream is evidence of war, good news, disaster, or sins. The interpretation of the state of the fire in the dream includes whether it is weak or strong and explanations of how to put it out and the tools used to put it out. Experts in dream interpretation have reported that whoever sees fire or flames with a sound and a bird. Light a fire in a dream. Seeing a burning fire in a dream without darkness is evidence that the dreamer is committing an heresy and must abandon it. However, if he lights it in the morning, this is a sign of rebellion or war. As for Whoever sees a fire burning from a village or town and bullets rising to the sky, this indicates that the people of that village or town are greatly exaggerating in their disobedience to the Almighty Creator. As for seeing an object or product burning in a dream, this indicates that you will be exposed to the cost of the products or their high prices. Home
